title: ðŸš¨Giants hire Joe Judge as head coach - Emergency Podcast (Football 1/7)
description:
Will Brinson is joined by John Breech and Sean Wagner-McGough to react to the Giants hiring Joe Judge to be their next head coach. The guys discuss how the hire happened and how Matt Rhule and the Panthers impacted the decision, give a briefing on who Judge exactly is and explain why his special teams background is so unique for head coaches. Will, John and Sean also break down the importance of Judge's coaching staff, his relationship with Dave Gettleman, Bill Belichick's coaching tree and expectations for New York both next year and during his Judge's tenure.
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy

itunes:subtitle: Will Brinson is joined by John Breech and Sean Wagner-McGough to react to the Giants hiring of the relatively unknown Joe Judge.
